entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
